While I’m no longer regular on LET, I’m always working to improve my offerings. So please, don’t forget about [SmallWeb](https://smallweb.net) this holiday season!

**What’s Coming in 2020?**

* New Shared and Reseller hosting locations in **Europe** and **Asia** coming at the start of the year.
<br>

* A brand new **Email** based plan provided through MXroute - Currently available soft launched!
<br>

* Revamped **Resellers**. We’ve tested with a 10GB plan but coming 2020 are the new 10GB, 20GB and 30GB reseller plans. The latter two coming with a FREE .COM and FREE monthly **Blesta**. 
<br>

* **[MakeMyKB](https://makemykb.com)**: Launching in early 2020 to provide Blesta users with over 100 professionally pre-written articles with images at no cost. Perfect to bundle with our upcoming Blesta Reseller plan.
